column5: nice report!  THose huts looked pretty awesome!  Cheers!
I was at snowfari too last weekend.  Not much luck.  What cabin were you in copper??
WE WERE AT THE FAR ONE WITH THE BLACK CHEVY!! WE DIDNT COME OUT MUCH  LOL JUST TO COOK  LOL
We were next to the guys with the generator running the christmas lights, stereo and big tv!!! They didn't have much luck either, but they did catch a mud puppy one night.

GOT OUT WITH MY GOOD BUD CHRIS FOR 3DAYS OF ICEFISHING!! AFTER 3 OR 4 STOPS AT TIMMIES ON THE WAY UP WE FINALLY MADE IT TO OUR DESTINATION SNOWFARI ADVENTURES   DIDNT EVEN UNPACK YET AND WE WERE EAGER TO GET SOME LINES IN THE WATER   NICE NEW AND CLEAN ICE HUTS CAN BELIEVE YA CAN LIE IN BED AND JIG  LOL   WASNT THERE LONG AT ALL AND MY ROD WENT OFF ON THIS LITTLE EYE   AS I WAS LANDING MY FISH CHRIS'S ROD GOES OFF   NOT A NIBBLE THE REST OF THE DAY!! NICE SHOT AS THE SUN GOES DOWN   TO START THE NEXT DAY OFF CHRIS HAULS IN A MONSTER PERCH  LOL   LATER THAT AFT FISH ON!!   LOW AND BEHOLD I PULL OUT MY FIRST HERRING EVER CAUGHT   THAT ENDED IT FOR FISH ACTION!!!WE GOT TO WATCH THE LEAFS LOSE ON OUR BIG SCREEN TV  LOL   WAS A GREAT AND FUN TRIP JUST TO BAD THE FISHING WASNT TOO GOOD !! WANNA THANK THE WIFE FOR A GREAT GIFT!! SNOWFARI FOR A GREAT PLACE AND SERVICE AND CHRIS FOR BEIN A GOOD SPORT ON THE SLOW FISHIN  LOL  BACK TO THE CHROME!!! LOL
Thanks for the detailed report at least you were not skunked and you seamed to have quicker reaction time than our friend CCMT CANADA. Mike
thanks for sharing your report CC,and nice pics and it looks like all you guys had fun and it was a worth while trip better luck next time...cheers
Thanks fer the report Chromer. Comfortable digs, eh.

great report as usual CC, i'm heading up to callandar bay on the 1st of march(reschedule from jan 4) so i'm pretty excited. could that the "whitie" that you caught actually be a lake herring?  i think that whitefish have a more pronounced overhung upper lip and usually kind of a hump on their back.  just asking because on the bay last year (and on simcoe too actually) we got into a whack of herring. can't wait untill your next chrome report. darcy
I am pretty sure the Whitey is a Lake Herring as well..pointed nose and no underslung jaw. Wish I had been out thanks for the report.
TX GUYS!! I DIDNT KNOW IF IT WAS A HERRING OR A WHITIE!!! ASKED A KID WORKIN THERE AND HE SAID WHITIE !!! ANY INPUT FROM EXPERIENCED GUYS??
Yup! That "whitie" is actually a blood thirsty killer Tullibee. I made the same mistake when I caught my first one too. Great report and pics!!!
Nice report Scott.  Looks like a fun weekend.  Jim

Great report CC glad yas had a good weekend. Gotta luv the sittin around in yur PJ's and jiggin in bed. That there fishy was definitly a herring. Nice couple of cigars yas got too. No pike? Oh well next time, great accomodations and company though eh!
nice report and looks like fun!
Looks a little more comfy that the others I see all bundled up, sittin out our the ice of a cold winder's day.  Great seeing the pics.  Nice report and thanks for posting them.
I double posted!
Nice trip for sure. I really like the big screen tv for the leaf game. Copper you should of kept the herring for Salmon fishing. cheers  al

Well I'd like to start by saying thanks a million Scott for having me along. To bad my bad luck followed us up there. So I guess you won the friendly bet on what the heck you caught. I second you on Snowfari, the owners where great as where the bungalows. To bad the fish only came buy from one to three o'clock in the afternoon! I don't think I could ice fish any other way now, sitting in a track suit, lying down with a fishing rod in one hand and a cool beverage in the other. The only thing missing was a shower and I think the one I had this afternoon at home was the best one ever!  Chris.  P.S. A thank you to my wife for making sure we had enough food so we didn't starve to death.
Great report Copper looks like a fun time out on the ice. Thanks
Awesome report and pics Scott!!  Looks like you guys had a great time....those huts were luxury!!!  I'm assuming you miss your steelies...so I'll be awaiting your report tomorrow....haha.
Nice pictures Scott....1 thing though why are you using atea towel to hold up that fish?...afraid to touch it??..see you at the show on wednesday!!!!
Great report Scott.  Ya, what's with the towel  And correct me if I'm wrong anyone, but I think that is a cisco, if its in Nippissing!  Joey
Ice fishing in your socks...how great is that!!!

Good to hear you had a good time ......just to bad about the fishing........but yous got some...We still on for Fri.???they're on the move out there and so are we.....I got all week to find them....As a Tyler Pre-fish ....lol.....tight lines all......
SLIMEY A SHELL THE FISH WAS (HENSE THE TOWEL  LOL) TODD I CANT MAKE IT TILL THE WEEKEND SO SEE YA THEN!! STILL ON BIG CHEV
Looks like a nice setup and a good time, thanks for the pic's...
Now that is what i call fishing.

Great report and pics  Scott.  Too bad about the fishing.Nippising can be a tough go lots of times.I see MANY post from other boards also, that the fishing was slow.and plp catching little to nothing.  Thats why this year,I am going to Abbitibi, im hoping that the fishign will be better   Anyway,  Love the report bud, good to see you fishing in a hut then along the riverside
